alert.note: Alert for Bennington (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued January 08 at 3:56AM EST until January 10 at 6:00AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY EVENING THROUGH LATE TUESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Southeast winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...In Massachusetts, Berkshire County. In New York, Herkimer, Hamilton, Eastern Rensselaer and Eastern Columbia Counties. In Vermont, Bennington County. * WHEN...From Tuesday evening through late Tuesday night. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.
